experiences.title: Senior technical lead
experiences.jobDescription:
In charge of several projects and teams of different sizes doing development, ops, roadmaps, architectural, technological and scientific choices and advice, cost estimation, mentoring, project and people management. For instance :
        ‚ó¶ Web Index : a web scale search index. As internal vespa.ai expert, deployment, administration, configuration of several vespa clusters (billions of web pages, hundreds of servers) serving as Qwant main web indices
        ‚ó¶ Ranking : using learning to rank to score web pages according to user queries
        ‚ó¶ Document understanding : building micro services and big data jobs to understand documents to retrieve them, from HTML parsing to information extraction using graph algorithms, natural language processing and machine learning.
        ‚ó¶ Qwant search backend : building a web scale search engine, web crawling, indexing, ranking, evaluation, search API‚Ä¶ 
        ‚ó¶ Tooling for the team, working on CI/CD, monitoring and alerting, spark jobs on kubernetes‚Ä¶
        ‚ó¶ Funded research project, AI4EU, Snapearth...
 
I am also Machine Learning domain lead : people are assigned to projects but also to a domain to share ideas, best practices and knowledge among people with similar expertise. I lead the Machine Learning domain regrouping all the data scientists, ML engineers and data engineers at Qwant.

I worked with Raphael when I was looking for a new job and when my company was looking for new engineer.

Raphael was very kind and efficient. He was one of the best recruiter I had to deal with, knowing its market very well.

He propose me relevant positions for my profile, showing that he understand well what are my profile, my expectations and my skills. When my company was looking for new engineer, he proposes a lot of interesting candidates and was very efficient in planning interviews, collecting feedbacks...

updates.postText:
üî• Picks Pronos - Clap de fin üèÖüèÅ

Alors que les Jeux Paralympiques continuent de briller √† Paris, il est temps pour moi de mettre fin √† l'aventure Picks Pronos. J'esp√®re que ce projet vous aura permis d‚Äôajouter un peu de piment √† ces jeux et de vibrer autant que moi üî• !

Tout d'abord, un grand bravo √† @jez pour son score stratosph√©rique de 8100 points, qui arrive premier parmi les 3378 autres participants üèÖ (qui est cette personne ? D√©noncez-le svp üòÑ) ! Comme annonc√©, tu n‚Äôas absolument rien gagn√© mis √† part la gloire √©ternelle d‚Äôavoir remport√© la toute premi√®re √©dition de Picks Pronos ! Bravo √©galement √† @nicolasbaby ü•à et √† @ned ü•â qui compl√®tent le podium.

Picks Pronos √©tait mon projet de fin d'√©tudes √† l‚Äô√©cole 42, o√π j'ai pu mettre en pratique toutes mes connaissances. Je l‚Äôai d√©velopp√© en solo, de la conception √† la r√©alisation, incluant le front-end, le back-end, la gestion des cotes, la saisie des r√©sultats, l'h√©bergement... Tout n‚Äôa pas √©t√© parfait, mais je suis fier d‚Äôavoir pu, √† mon √©chelle, contribuer √† la magie du sport et des jeux üèüÔ∏è.

Cette aventure n'aurait pas √©t√© possible sans le soutien de nombreuses personnes, donc un grand merci √† :
Soutien de tous les jours : M√©lanie Guichard, Maxime Lavoine, No√©mie Rettien üôè

üéºTech Lead sur une startup en pleine refonte technique, business et humaine. üéº

Techniquement parlant:
- R√©√©criture compl√®te d'un backend legacy en Python 2 -> Python 3 (40k lignes de code dont 20k de tests)
- D√©veloppement d'une API HTTP, Worker server, Websocket server

- R√©√©criture + maintenance de la codebase front (Passage de Jinja + Vue √† Nuxt.js)

- D√©veloppement des nouvelles fonctionnalit√©s du site (Payments, Communautaires, Cr√©ateurs, Gestion de catalogue, Cours et apprentissage d' un instrument, etc.... Name it, I did it.)
- Remise √† plat de la CI, mise en place de l'outillage de monitoring (Datadog, Sentry, Pingdom). Time to recovery : <30 minutes du code √† la prod.
- Mise en place d'une infrastructure de prod scalable automatiquement et maintenable sans SRE (üíñCleverCloud)
- Mise en place d'une stack d'analytics interne pour rendre disponible √† tous les chiffres de l'entreprise (nouveaux comptes, ventes, activit√©, churn etc...) en utilisant Metabase
- D√©velopement d'une infra vid√©o compl√®te instrument√©e en Rust + Apache Pulsar + Mux.com
